titleStmt.title: A letter sent from those Lords, whose names are under-written, to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in the high court of Parliament, June the 4. 1642

notesStmt.note: Signed at end by the Lord Northampton [and 8 others].
Protesting an order summoning them to appear at the bar of the House as delinquents.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
